title: A Naughty Thing called Life
description: Papa Spyk Recalls Colourful Life Journey in A Naughty Thing called Life New book chronicles the author's life and how it was turned around after suffering a near death experience Sometimes all it takes is one dramatic event to be the catalyst for change. Author Papa Spyk takes readers on a nostalgic road down memory lane as he recalls A Naughty Thing called Life
author: Papa Spyk
